LanguageData.ODC_MCV.label: Mobile Colonial Vehicle
LanguageData.ODC_MCV.description:
Mobile Colonial Vehicle(MCV) are the basis of the Obsidia Empire expansion in the past. Slow and lightly armed, but super-armored vehicle. Excellent for transporting a large number of pawns and cargo over long distances. Nowadays used by ODC.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1 Gunner x2 Passenger x12
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Syntherius

LanguageData.OMC_Nightmare.label: Sutherland
LanguageData.OMC_Nightmare.description:
Nightmare are arachna-like war machines developed by Obsidia Empire.

This model is developed by OMC and is equipped with a Sniper turret.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Pilot x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Syntherius
